jdbcService.sql: select * from ~process_actions pa join ~process_states ps on pa.process_state_id = ps.id join ~process_versions pv on ps.process_version_id = pv.id -- only active ones! where pv.released is not null and pv.deactivated is null and pa.signal_id = :signalId -- if we _send_ the signal, we don't want to subscribe to it as well and pa.automatic = false
